item.title: v1.0.0-beta
item.description:
Changes in Overview v1.0.0-beta

Features:

  • Implemented developer ID Apple notarization for direct distribution
  • Automatic update feature added, with beta channel
  • Permission manager now handles permission state and setup window
  • Context menu item added to stop capture/return to selectio view
  • Option added to show both application name and window title in overlay
  • Dock icon now shows while in permission setup or while settings window is open
